dumriya shrenigatha wruththiya samithi ekathuwatharaka wikramasekarapasugiya sathiye dumriya sewawa adala wimata hethuwa watup prashnayak ho wenath wruththiya shreniyaka prashnayak nowana bawa dumriya shrenigatha wruththiya samithi ekathuwe kandawumkaru janaka pranandu mahatha pawasayi.winaya hethun matha warak sewayen pahakota athi dumriya riyaduraku saha thawath kanishta karya mandala thakshana shilpiyaku dumriya adhikshana niladharin washayen pathkara owun wisin departhamenthuwe rajakari katayuthu sandaha anisi lesa angili gasim sidu kirimata erehiwa piyawara ganima mita hethuwa bawa ohu penwa deyi.dumriya departhamenthuwe wruththiya samithi 25 kata adhika sankhyawak sahitha me samithi ekathuwe illima wuye ema niladharin wisin departhamenthuwe sewakayanta anisi balapam ella kirima nawathwiya yuthu bawath ee sandaha adhikshana niladharin lesa pathkara thibu ema sewakayan dedena yali pera sewa sthanawalata anuyuktha karana lesathya.amathyawaraya dumriya riyadura adhikshana niladhari thanathuren iwath kara riyaduraku lesa yali sewayata path kirima nisa ohuta hithawath kihipa denaku sewayen walaki sitima me thaththwayata hethu wi athi bawath, riyadurange wishesha wibhagayak nisa me thaththwaya thawath wardhanaya wu bawath dumriya dhawanaya yatha thaththwayata path kirimata wruththiya samithi 25 kin pamana samanwitha shrenigatha wruththiya samithi ekathuwa departhamenthuwata sahaya laba dena bawath janaka pranandu mahatha kiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

ohoma wikara api kiyewwa..hariyatama kiyanna tharam mathakaya mata naha dan.ee serama dewal maruna dewal wela mata.eeta passe dawase mama skole aruna gaman duwala giye shehanige skoleta,ekayi eda mama kiyannewath nathuwa ikmaninma skolen giye.dannawane mata bayik eken skole enna denne na kiyala.ithin eda bas ekema thamayi giye.yanagaman kiwwa kol ekak dila mama enakan inna kiyala shehanita..passe mama giya shehanige skole gawata.mama ethanata giyahama eyage skole un mage diha amuthuwata baluwe.welawata mage anith band eke un hitiye.ethana hitiye oyage fewarit dilipa,kusal,eshanuyi witharayi mama danna widihata.dilipayam mage iskole ekane.ethana chatak dagena innakota shehani awa.ehemma bas ekata nagga.nagala magen ahuwe ko mage bayik eka kiyala."skole yanna denne na eken mata"
